title: PNW Contemporary Home.  Sweeping Water Views.  Private Beach
map_address: Marine View Drive near 104th Street SW
posting_body: ['Available August 21st (no sooner)', 'Furnished, Unfurnished, or partially furnished!', 'Rent to Buy Option available.', 'Seller financing optional.', 'Bright and Open 2 Story Home perched high off street in exclusive West Seattle neighborhood.', 'Walk 3 blocks to private community beach or 4 blocks to bus-stop.', ' downtown 30 minutes in rush hour.', 'Upper level of home has high open beam ceilings, minimal barrier walls and sweeping wireless water views.', '2 bedrooms, one bath, chefs kitchen, and open family room or office in spare space.', 'Lower level has water views from living/family room.', ' There is also a 3/4 bath, bedroom, and spare kitchen, office or laundry room (You decide).', ' Great nanny or extended family option or expanded space for live work space.', 'Home has updated kitchens/baths.', ' Hardwood floors throughout (no carpet), air conditioning, fully fenced yard, quiet private patio, tons of storage and attached 2 car garage.', ' Private dead end street, very safe, established neighborhood.', 'Rent:  $4,750 per month for 12 month lease (shorter terms negotiable)', 'Deposit $3,500', 'Required at Move in:  First month + deposit ($8,250)', 'Home can be furnished for added monthly rent fee', 'Utilities (water, electric, cable/internet) paid by tenant', 'Owner covers yard care.', 'Rent may be reduced if tenant wants to cover', 'Pet Deposit $250.', '  Max 1 pet.', ' Dogs must be 35lbs or less to fit thru medium size dog door.', 'Rental Criteria:', '$45 application fee per adult (anyone 18 yrs or older)', 'Max debt to income 45% (total debt including housing divided by gross income);   740+ Credit Score, and 6 months of  rent ($28.5K), in reserves, after move in costs, to be verified at application.', 'For appointment to view,  please reply with the following info:', '1.', ' Furnished or Unfurnished Space?', '2.', ' # of people in your party?', '(# of beds needed?)', '3.', 'Length of stay desired (start and end dates)', '4.', 'Do you have a pet?', ' if yes, type and size', '5.', 'Phone # to set up appt to view home', '6.', ' Confirmation you meet all of the rental criteria listed above.', 'Location:  30 minutes to downtown by car or bus.', ' 20 minutes to Boeing, SeaTac or airport.', ' Shopping, Parks, Schools all within 2 miles of home.', ' Alki Beach or Lincoln Park also nearby (5 minute drive)']
